bug.author: catenamatteo
bug.summary: LightGBMRanker with ValidationIndicatorCol: is the metric validated only up to @5?
bug.description:
Hello, I'm using LightGBMRanker with ValidationIndicatorCol to enable earlyStopping. From the logs, I can see that ndcg is evaluated up to the 5th position, even if i use .setMaxPosition(10). This is what I see: <denchmark-code>2019-09-27 15:37:29 INFO LightGBMRanker:212 - Valid ndcg@1=0.5995674734206613 2019-09-27 15:37:29 INFO LightGBMRanker:212 - Valid ndcg@2=0.6006100821389552 2019-09-27 15:37:29 INFO LightGBMRanker:212 - Valid ndcg@3=0.5948781960139197 2019-09-27 15:37:29 INFO LightGBMRanker:212 - Valid ndcg@4=0.5992964390181633 2019-09-27 15:37:29 INFO LightGBMRanker:212 - Valid ndcg@5=0.6006352154720541 </denchmark-code>
Is the log's output somehow truncated, or is ndcg evaluated indeed only up to 5th position? Is there a way to change this behavior so that ndcg in validation is evaluated as per .setMaxPosition()?
